app_description: Whether you re traveling to new places or trying to get started learning a new language thanks to Go Translate the language is no longer a barrier to communication. Voice Translation Speak to translate. Dictate what you want to translate and let the app read out the translation or read it on your screen. Camera Translation Translate any pic or text using your camera. Easily translate menus signs or any paper document. Text Translation Enter the phrase you want to translate to receive the results in text format or listen to the correct pronunciation.
